Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed was named Player of the Match for his 4/25 performance.
Colin Ackermann scored 62 off 48 balls for the Netherlands.
Paul van Meekeren scored 24 off 14 balls for the Netherlands.
Afif Hossain scored 38 off 27 balls for Bangladesh.
Hasan Mahmud took 2 wickets for 15 runs for Bangladesh.
Paul van Meekeren took 2 wickets for 21 runs for the Netherlands.
Bas de Leede took 2 wickets for 29 runs for the Netherlands.
Taskin Ahmed started the innings with two wickets.
Two run-outs were pivotal in the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan expressed the importance of the win and praised the team's fast bowlers.
Scott Edwards, Netherlands captain, praised his bowlers but lamented the run-outs.
Taskin Ahmed reflected on his performance and the importance of sticking to basics and learning from Allan Donald.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Taskin Ahmed dismissed two Netherlands players on golden ducks.
Bangladesh's record in the Round 2 of men's T20 World Cup: Played 17, Won 1, Lost 16.
